document_data.name: ''Staff of Battle''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''staff of battle''''' was a [[magic]]al ''+3 [[staff]]'' of tremendous speed that possessed a number of abilities and [[spell]]-like effects.{{Cite dragon/173/Bazaar of the Bizarre: A wizard's staff is to lean on}}<ref name=RoMD.CG-p109-110">
document_data.Powers:
The staff had a number of continuous abilities such as being unbreakable by any blade, having a chance to disarm opponents, and attracting and absorbing missiles, including ''[[magic missile]]s'', from up to 10' (3 m) away, rendering them harmless.<ref name=RoMD.CG-p109-110"/>

At will, and at the cost of two magical charges, the staff could repel creatures as per the spell ''[[repulsion]]''.
Also once per day, the wielder could cast ''[[thunderstrike]]'' upon landing a blow, possibly [[stun]]ning their opponent or destroying doors, shields, or other non-living objects.<ref name=RoMD.CG-p109-110"/>
